name: outlandishness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
behaviour that is strange and unusual and difficult to accept or like: They reacted badly to their mother's increasing outlandishness. They seemed shocked at the outlandishness of the suggestion. See
outlandish
More examplesFewer examplesThe review referred to the outlandishness of certain characters in the play.His old outlandishness still appears on occasion.They attempted to minimize the outlandishness of bonuses in the eyes of most Americans.
